services.title: Comprehensive Logistics Solutions
services.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive range of logistics services designed to meet all your shipping and cargo needs

international.title: International Shipping
international.description: We manage global shipping from origin to destination, providing both air and sea freight options to suit your timeline and budget.

lastMile.title: Last-Mile Delivery
lastMile.description: Our reliable last-mile delivery service ensures that your products reach the final destination efficiently, providing tracking and updates.

warehousing.title: Warehousing & Distribution
warehousing.description: Our strategically located warehouses ensure fast, secure storage and distribution of your products. With flexible storage options.

supply.title: Supply Optimization
supply.description: Our expert team analyzes and improves your supply chain for maximum efficiency and cost savings.

customs.title: Customs Clearance
customs.description: We navigate the complexities of customs regulations and procedures to ensure smooth clearance.

groundTransport.title: Ground Transportation
groundTransport.description: Reliable door-to-door delivery services across all major cities and regions with our extensive network of professional drivers and modern fleet.

oceanFreight.title: Ocean Freight
oceanFreight.description: Cost-effective shipping solutions for large cargo and international trade with comprehensive port-to-port services worldwide.

warehousing.title: Warehousing
warehousing.description: Secure storage facilities with advanced inventory management systems and climate-controlled environments for all cargo types.

seaFreight.title: Sea Freight
seaFreight.description: Complete sea freight services for full and shared containers

customs.title: Customs Clearance

about.title: About DNS Sea Cargo
about.subtitle: Your trusted logistics partner
about.description: With years of experience in the logistics industry, DNS Sea Cargo has established itself as a leading provider of comprehensive shipping and logistics solutions.
about.missionText: To provide reliable, efficient, and cost-effective logistics solutions that exceed our clients' expectations.
about.visionText: To be the preferred logistics partner for businesses worldwide, known for our excellence and innovation.
about.valuesText: Integrity, reliability, customer focus, and continuous improvement are the core values that drive our business.
about.teamText: Our experienced team of logistics professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional service and support.

international.question: Do you handle international shipments?
international.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to a wide range of countries. Please check our shipping policy or contact customer support for specific destination availability.

services.question: What types of shipping services do you offer?
services.answer: We provide several shipping options including standard, expedited, and express services. The available options may vary depending on your location and the items ordered.

tracking.question: Can I track my shipment?
tracking.answer: Absolutely. Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this to monitor your shipment's progress in real time.

delivery.question: How long does delivery take?
delivery.answer: Delivery times vary depending on the shipping method and destination. Typically, international orders arrive within 5 to 15 business days. Express options may offer faster delivery.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by businesses worldwide for reliable shipping solutions

ahmed.name: Ahmed Al-Rashid
ahmed.testimonial: DEREA AL NUHAS has been our trusted logistics partner for over 5 years. Their reliability and professional service have helped us expand our business globally.

fatima.name: Fatima Benali
fatima.testimonial: Exceptional service quality and competitive pricing. They handle our Morocco-Europe trade routes with remarkable efficiency and care.

omar.name: Omar Hassan
omar.testimonial: Their customs clearance expertise has saved us countless hours and costs. DEREA AL NUHAS understands the complexities of international trade.

sarah.name: Sarah Khalil
sarah.testimonial: Professional team with deep knowledge of Mediterranean shipping routes. They consistently deliver on time and within budget.

youssef.name: Youssef Ben Salem
youssef.testimonial: Outstanding warehousing and distribution services. Their Tunis facility has become an integral part of our supply chain.

khalid.name: Khalid Al-Mansouri
khalid.testimonial: DEREA AL NUHAS expertise in handling sensitive cargo and their commitment to safety standards is unmatched in the region.

amina.name: Amina Bouazza
amina.testimonial: Their door-to-door service from Algeria to international markets has significantly streamlined our operations.

mohammed.name: Mohammed Al-Thani
mohammed.testimonial: Reliable partner for our Qatar-based operations. Their technology platform provides excellent shipment visibility.

layla.name: Layla Al-Sabah
layla.testimonial: Fast and efficient service with competitive rates. They understand the unique requirements of the Kuwaiti market.

nadia.name: Nadia Al-Zahra
nadia.testimonial: Their expertise in cross-border logistics and regulatory compliance has been invaluable for our regional expansion.
